message.body: I think Jacob and I came up with some good ideas for the video. I'll fill you in tomorrow.

So our idea was that in the video we should be searching for a tape collection ( a relic from the past). After I find the tape collection, I'll meet up with Brad and Jacob in a bar. I'll pour the tapes out of a bag onto a table, and we'll find a tape of "Into the Wild" (our song), and it will end with putting the tape into a Walkman.
How will we shoot in a bar?
I mean maybe I can just being a camera in. An outdoor bar might be best
I have to check on this, but I think Brad might be friendly enough with some that would let us film inside. I suppose outside could work as well.
Oh that would be awesome. So I was thinking to do these scenes of searching around the city with Minimal interference the earlier the better
8 am theres no one walking around the city and we could basically go anywhere without distraction
I can go as early as u can if u think that is a good idea
Yeah, you're probably right. I can go early as well (not sure about my band mates). Of course, having people around could also be interesting. It might help emphasize our out of place appearance.
yeah but early u can go into parking lots with no cars. Rooftops etc. Up to buildings without security guards and stuff in the way. Ppl staring at u. Just my opinion.
Ok, I'll suggest it. I'm sure I can get them to agree to wake up early. Hopefully, it won't require bribery :)
yeah just lemme know. I drove past metuchen the other night to see my Gf. U live pretty far away!
Yeah, I'm moving out of here pretty soon, but I work here, so I can't move too far away. Brad is going on vacation next week. Maybe when he gets back, we can all meet up, and come up with a plan?
